How To Play
 
Intro
This game is based on the popular card game trump cards. It is a game that requires on some luck, skill and your knowledge about cars. The objective of the game is to beat your opponent by selecting a category that your car is better at than your opponent's car. The weight category is the only case which you would want a lower figure to win the round.


Step 1
 A card will be drawn for both you and your opponent, you only get to see your card for now. Click on the category you think has the best chance to beat your opponents card.


Step 2
 You will now briefly be shown your opponents card and who won(look for green for a win and red for a lose). A new cad will be drawn for you and rinse repeat.


Lives: Keep an eye on your lifes in the top right hand corner shown as litle hearts with pistons inside of them. Each match will start with 3 lifes and you will lose a life every time you lose a round until there are no more lives left.


Score: Your score will be shown in the top left corner, you will be awarded one point for every round you win.


Power-Ups
 There are 3 types of power ups available 50/50, Hint and Upgrade. Each can only be used 3 times in a match. 

50/50: This will remove 2 losing categories, there is a guaranteed winning category left to choice otherwise you get to keep your 50/50 power up. 

Hint: This will briefly show you your oppenents car but not it's statistics. 

Upgrade: This is only become available with some cars, this will upgrade your card to a better model car.
